## Non-inear fitting

```{r, message=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(brms)

N <- 100
x <- seq(0, 10, length.out = N)
e <- rnorm(N, 0.1)
y <- 7 * sin(2.5 * x) + e
inp_data <- tibble(x, y)
plot(inp_data, type = 'l')



sin_fit <- brm(bf(y ~ a * sin(b * x), a + b ~ 1, nl = TRUE),
               data = inp_data, prior = priors, refresh = 0)

summary(sin_fit)
plot(sin_fit)
beepr::beep(2)
```
